title: Rounded blocky 1980's style sans-serif, vaguely similar to a heavy Foco or Arial with asymmetric rounding
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317061939im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ND_6179.png)

First time up here. I have this low-fidelity sample I am trying to match. Don't know the source of it, whether it was originally hand-done or digital. Would greatly appreciate some help in identifying it.

Thanks.

Mark
